home.title: Hi I'm
home.primaryText: I'm a software developer, I like to create things that live on the internet, from websites to applications.
home.thirdText: I'm working with React Native, React, .Net Ecosystem and NextJS. I'm currently improving Java, Software Architecture and Design Patterns.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a self-taught person, born and raised in Chihuahua, Mexico. I'm into react ecosystem, I've been working with it for 2 and a half years. I'm currently working as a Mobile Developer.
about.description2: I like to play games, if I'm not playing games I'm probably watching movies or series.

work.description1: I'm working react native and .Net, applying Clean Code, Clean Architecture principles, Design Patterns and testing integration.
work.description2: I worked with ASP.NET, I was in charge of maintaining one module of the system and I helped with another modules, I also worked with the database creating some stored procedures and functions.
work.description3: Systems Engineer, specialty Agile Software Development.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: Here are a few projects I've worked on recently. Want to see more? Email me.
